mission: CUBO+ Educational Program is an initiative designed by and for  Salvadorans, aimed at training the upcoming generation of Salvadoran programmers. These students were equipped with the skills and knowledge needed to shape the future of Bitcoin adoption and develop innovative solutions that would drive economic growth within the local community.
We are descovering for the brightest and most entrepreneurial minds that contribute to the technological and economic future of El Salvador.
testimonialssection: Discover what others are sharing about us!

testimonials.name: The Bitcoin Office
testimonials.content:
For the past two weeks, some of El Salvador's elite Bitcoin and Lightning devs students of @cuboplus had the opportunity to travel to italy for further advanced technical education with @FulgurVentures

And then they attended @LuganoPlanB in Switzerlad
